document.full_text: a week before jury selection begins in the manslaughter trial of michael jackson's doctor, the late singer's father renewed calls for a federal probe into his son's death based on his belief a conspiracy was at work.
document.title: jackson dad renews call for new probe of son's death
lines_and_colors: a week before jury selection begins in the manslaughter trial of michael jackson's doctor, the late singer's father renewed calls for a federal probe into his son's death based on his belief a conspiracy was at work.
